Игруха просто КЛАСС ! Особенно за Маньяка)))

Игру стоит покупать если хочется поиграть за маньяка, за кем-либо поохотиться. Точка.
Дизбаланс во всем. Все преимущество в сторону маньяка и разработчики продолжают двигаться в том-же направлении.
Поощрение различных тактик - кэмперство например. "Ваншоты" все-го и вся. Дело в том что в нашем (и не только) сегменте как правило пишут только маньяки - вечно ноют. То одно не так, то это не так. И судя по всему разработчики присматриваются только к этим вариантам.
Из 10 игр в 3, вас будут кэмпить, в 3 вас будут преследовать после того как спасут, в 3 вы будете заканчивать с 5-6 тысячами очков, а маньяк как правило с 25-30, и только в одной оставшейся у вас успешно получится сбежать, причем одному из 4. И закончите вы с 15 тысячами очков. А маньяк все-равно с 20-30. 
Играю только за выживших. Тактика стелса тут совсем не канает. Вас обязательно найдут и обязтельно повесят на крюк.
Так что не стоит тратить деньги на данный продукт. В плане саппорта - реакции со стороны разработчиков - 0.

A proposta do jogo é muito boa, é bem divertido jogar de Killer.
Cada killer tem habilidades diferentes, e os cenários do jogo são bem varíados.
Jogando de Survivor você sente a tensão de um jogo de terror, além do coop ser muito bom.
O lado negativo é que para habilitar mais da metade dos Killers você tem que pagar.

This game doesn't even deserve a full fledged review, but all I have to say is, No!   This game is TONS of fun, "For the most part"...   It CAN be fun alone or with friends, "For the most part"...   This game is up there in Toxicity with LOL (League of Legends), and it's bad.   Not going to list everything Toxic, but just to get the point across.   BM'ing Galore, AKA Bad Manner,  Death Threats,  Bullying, (Cyber Bullying), Salty Grown Adults and Children throwing shade at you if you did good, or bad, doesn't matter how you played.   Killer Camping/Tunnels, TOXIC!  Killer does everything right to be a good boi, TOXIC!   Survivor's, they all die, TRASH KILLER! Survivor's, they all escape, TRASH/PATHETIC KILLER!  Moral of the story,  NOTHING will please any side, they're both Toddlers. 

The Steam Forums for DBD, it's like watching 4 Toddlers yell at each other about who got what, that might of been better, but who cares?   The Forums 24/7 is filled with complainers about what the Developers did wrong, and Complaining about in game players playing bad or being Toxic, it's always the same thing every day, nothing changes.

    Developers try to fix their game, but instead of doing what the Community may know is the right direction, they brush it off and continue to Screw over their game, adding new Perks, Killers, Cosmetic, Archives, Bugs, Glitches, etc.   Do the Devs actually care about their game and Community?  Not in the slightest.   They say, "We Take these issues "VERY SERIOUSLY", we do hope you understand."   Recent problems appeared as to be DDOS'ing of Twitch Streamers, ending up being SWATTED because some Salty Crying Child on the Survivor side or Killer Side, decided I'M LOSING or YOU BROUGHT NOED (No one escapes Death), or I DIDN'T LIKE HOW THEY PLAYED, so I'm just gonna screw over their PC and get them into trouble, even though it's JUST a game.

Hackers!  I'm glad I haven't come across any hackers in my time playing Dead by Daylight, but as far as what I've seen,  you might run into certain players that have flight abilities, or God mode, (Not getting injured or going down),  Teleportation, etc, you name it!   There's really no way around dealing with a hacker in DBD, the only thing you can do is DC which sucks, cause if you do get a hacker, they can hold the game hostage for however long they want.
 
    Honestly, the WHOLE Community, even Twitch streamers, (Some not All), they act like Children, and it's not even funny.   A Twitch Streamer or some Twitch Streamers do actually stoop to the Toxic Communities level, and do the EXACT same crap.  They'll also throw Shade on the Complainers or they'll be Toxic back, which isn't helping anyone.  I see this and I just think, you do know Two Wrongs Never make a right?  The Answers always the same too, "I Don't Care, It's not my problem they can't See how dumb it is", well I'm sorry, but I've seen how you react, and it's the same as them.   Twitch Steamers be like: I love this game.  LATER ON, WTF ARE YOU DOING YOU PIECE OF SHIT?! Oh My GOSH, PLAY THE GAME!!!!!  Honestly, it's Pathetic.

I enjoy this game for what it is, but I can't say I agree on the choices Behavior has made for their game, it's quite bad.   I will recommend if you just like to have fun, and you don't care about winning, but for newcomers, or players that are SUPER competitive in DBD, no, please, this isn't a Competitive game, play CS:GO if that's what you want.  Newcomers, please, I know some of you have regretted buying this with 2 hours of play time, and thinking It'll be FUN!  I've seen your threads complaining.   You should stay away from this hot mess.

Dead by daylight è un gioco strano. Non può piacere a tutti e non è certamente il gioco dell'anno. 
Ci sono bug, abilità sbilanciate, gente che ti facecampera all'uncino e non ti da proprio una possibilità di vincere, gente tossicissima etc. etc.
Alla fine con il tempo ci si abitua a queste cose, e sappiamo che contro il camping i devs non possono farci nulla, se no tutti i killer diventerebbero dei freddy prima del rework xD
Utimamente stanno uscendo collaborazioni molto carine tipo quella di Stranger Things, reworkando i killer usciti male, e stanno aggiungendo finalmente i server dedicati. La roadmap dell'anno 4 ci promette tantissime nuove cose molto interessanti, l'unica cosa che resta è sperare xD
Se volete un gioco su cui giocare 24h/24 e non siete tanto irascibili questo gioco fa per voi. Se invece vi incazzate se su fortnite l'amico vi ruba l'arma allora potreste trovare il gioco un pò snervante.
ALTIMA SIÇIYORUM

"キラーでプレイしたいという方には一切オススメしません"

キラーで10回ゲームをプレイしそのうち4回は全員に逃げられたりすることもありましたがとても楽しくプレイできました
しかし残りの6回はひどかった
初心者キラーを煽るためにわざわざ低ランクにいる高レベル帯のサバイバーに煽られまくりです
煽りに一切ペナルティがないためモラルの低いまさに動物園状態
またプレイヤーの「キラーをプレイしてるとストレスが大きいので何とかしてくれ」というお願いに対して
開発が「シヴィライゼーションでもやってろ」と言い放っています（後に謝罪）ので
今後も動物園状態が改善されることはなさそうです

それでもキラーやりたいという方へ一つアドバイス
「懐中電灯を持ってるサバイバーとパーティを組んでるサバイバーを見かけたら即切断しよう」
Extrem lange Ladezeiten, die Steuerung ist schwammig, Killer sind OP, es laggt und es macht nicht wirklich viel Spaß.
pretty good job so far

Настало время и мне написать отзыв о данной игре.Назвать ее супер-я не могу,но выделю плюсы и минусы игры.
Первый минус это не самый удачный баланс и система подбора игроков. Второй минус, непонятая мне до сих пор "этика"так называемых выживших которые поливают говном тех маньяков кто кемпит и туннелит и т.д.Я сам не особый любитель кемпинга и туннелинга,но данной "этики" не понимаю.Я купил эту игру , как хочу так и играю.Хостом в игре является маньяк ,котрый создает игру,так что выжившие сами присоединяются к вам.
Третий минус -русское комьюнити,школьники и всякие неадекваты после завершения катки так и хотят вас обосрать и показать какие они ПРО игроки.Любители "заваривать чайные пакетики" тоже присутствуют.
Плюсов в игре конечно больше,но их вы увидите сами, когда купите и начнете играть в нее.Этот отзыв я пишу от лица маньяка,т.к. большу часть времени я провел играя именно по эту "темную" сторону.

[h1] Sobreviventes VERSUS "Monstro" [/h1]

  Dead By Daylight é um jogo apenas multiplayer, onde 4 sobreviventes tentam fugir de 1 assassino, todos controlados por jogadores. Existem diversas formas de escapar, assim como de [b]não[/b] escapar.
  Diversos assassinos estão disponíveis para jogar, e novas são lançados via DLCs pagas. O mesmo se aplica para os sobreviventes. Os assassinos possuem habilidades especiais mais distintas; cada um é diferente e único.
  Contudo, o jogo possui sérios problemas de perfomance, que nem vale a penar citar, uma vez que a lista é extensa.
  É sim um bom jogo, mas seus problemas de compatibilidade atrapalham a jogatina ou mesmo impedem de sequer iniciar o jogo.


NOTA: 8/10 ([i]quando funciona[/i])

[h1] [b] Highly addictive and spine chilling [/b] [/h1]

Dead by Daylight is super addictive and fun to play.It will constantly keep you at the edge from start till the end of the game.In this game there are 4 survior and 1 killer.The survivors's job is to repair 5 generators and the killer's job is to stop them from repairing the generators and put them on the hooks(eventually kill them).This sounds easy but it's not easy as it seems.The killer got tools to find survivors and stop them,similarly survivors also got tools to evade the killer.It's basically the the skill of survivor vs the skill of killer with a bit of luck in it.
.
 Survivors can either cooperate with the others or be solo.Your chance of survival will vary depending on whether you work together as a team or if you go at it alone.Overall the game is fun to play and you will never get bored once you get the hang of it.Every game is different since you get different players in every game with different play styles.The only thing that remains same will be the sense of forbording and dread.Also this game is super fun to play with friends.
.
[b] The only negative thing that I found about this game is the lengthy matchmaking system,time and peer to peer hosting with lack of dedicated servers which leads to latency problems if killer's connection is not good. [/b]
.

Also new players prepare to get frustrated a lot till you get enough experience.You simply can't expect to out smart a player who had put a lot of time in learning his game.As I said earlier it boils down to the skill of killer vs skill of survior.
.
Also player complaining about camping,killers can be duped all it takes certain perks which you will learn eventually and skilled two survivor one to distract and one to save.Just give some time watch youtube videos and learn from it.
.
This game can't be mastered in 24 hrs you have to play at least 100 hrs to get the hang of it.So the player who are not patient  shouldn't buy this game.This game is not for you.This is my personal experience it can be learned in less time also,it depends on players.
.
[b] And finally don't be a sore loser and learn to respect the skill of other. [/b]

EDIT:- Now the game has become a complete laughter fest due to wining of baby players and immature nerfs and buffs of the devs.

Best game ive played in a while.
 There are a lot of bugs though, but it's definitely worth the money.

Czas na małe odświeżenie recenzji:
-killerzy - mają spory problemy w zabijaniu niż te 4 lata temu, a niektóre ich perki można wywalić bo są bezużyteczne, zwłaszcza gdy ocalali biorą boon totemy, które mogą stawiać sobie ile zechcą i w zamian nie słyszysz ich i mogą się nawet leczyć z prędkością 400%. 
-ocalali - ciężej nimi znaleźć mecz (można szukać nawet 5 minut) a killerem można znaleźć mecz nawet w 30 sekund, perki zauważalnie mocniejsze (hekhem boon totemy hekhem), więcej metod na counterowanie killerów, też posiadają (niektóre) śmieciowe perki.
-Game dev - W skrócie (boon totemy, problemy z hitboxami, cheaterzy, bugi, bugi i WIĘCEJ bugów) *I think we did a pretty good JoB So fAR* 
Czy polecam grę na chwilę obecną? 
Ciężko stwierdzić, zwłaszcza że niektóre zmiany jak dla mnie mordują trochę tą grę, sam gameplay nadal jest przyjemny, ale czasem frustrujący. Mimo wszystko polecam grę, ale bardziej radzę dawkować gameplay, bo łatwo można się znudzić, albo gorzej - zrobić rage quita i nie wrócić.
Jedna z Najlepszych gier w które grałem. POLECAM

想来一场紧张刺激的脸红心跳之旅吗？那就来一起杀机吧，这里有高大壮硕的夹子男，神出鬼没的小叮当，可爱的拐杖锯子，温柔的护士小姐姐，神奇的教授杨永信，身材火辣的巫妖婆婆，温情暖男麦克尔，伟大教父弗莱迪，尾行可爱的小猪妹。好游戏，YY开黑乐趣多，各种人才说话又好听神作。
就是服务器有点小不足。(友情提示：路人局别修最后一个电机，必上钩必守尸，队友必抛弃你。路人局什么也别干，就暴走族，安抚生灵，自摸，摸宝箱，就猥琐什么都不干都比别人分来的多，逃生5000分修一个电机才1000分，就TM等队友修电机你去开门跑就行。别问我为什么打路人局学队友的。如果不听，你会发现这个游戏玩起来很不爽，因为你辛辛苦苦救四次人修了三个电机。最后你还是惟一一次上树你就到了，然后就你一个死了。）

I haven't actually played 4.5.0...yet. Mostly been playing Valheim and it is AWESOME! Anyways...I noticed all the bad reviews popping up on my feed, and I wanted to be just like the cool kids because they seem to get it.

Let us all pray in the next installment they would have made enough money to provide servers instead of peer to peer. That's holding the game back quite a bit as it can be tough finding a match as a killer when the lobby is full of red bars.

There's a few QoL changes I feel they need. Other than that it's the best game of its genre easily. Very addicting. If you have a poor internet connection there is literally no reaosn to buy this game though. It's also extremely toxic. So heed those warnings and otherwise enjoy!
